name: Old Man
text: Hello Adventurer, I wish you luck on your journey.

name: Old Man
text: Perhaps are you lost? Just follow the pathway.

name: Old Man
text: One of the key to success is KNOWLEDGE.

name: Old Man
text: I'm kinda lost right now, but I'll be okay.

name: Old Man
text: I'm a vegan because I can't hunt because of my age.

name: Old Man
text: May the Godddess of luck be with you.

name: Old Man
text: Impossible is a word to be found only in the dictionary of fools.
